text:
Pieter Marinus "Piet" Blauw (30 September 1937 – 16 May 2019) was a Dutch politician and farmer. He was a member of the People's Party for Freedom and Democracy (VVD). He became a member of the House of Representatives in 1981, serving until 1998. He born in Alkmaar, North Holland.
Blauw died on 16 May 2019 in Veendam, Groningen. He was 81.

annotations.surface_form: People's Party for Freedom and Democracy
